name: Skincare Shelf
short_description: AI-powered app for personalized skincare analysis and product recommendations
description: Skincare Shelf is a web-based platform designed to help users make informed skincare choices by analyzing ingredients and providing personalized product recommendations. I am developing this app using Next.js, Python, and FastAPI. The platform includes a scalable database of skincare products and user-generated ratings, improving product discoverability and user outcomes.

name: AI Music Generator
short_description: Full-stack platform for real-time AI-powered music generation
description: The AI Music Generator is a full-stack application that creates dynamic, real-time music using AI models. It provides an intuitive interface for users to interact with AI-powered compositions. I led a team of six to design and implement the platform, integrating four AI models and deploying it on Heroku. I also built the backend using Flask and MongoDB for efficient data storage and retrieval.

name: Avatar Dealer
short_description: Unreal Engine 5 project enhancing avatar interactions using AI
description: Avatar Dealer enhances in-game interactions with lifelike AI-powered avatars in Unreal Engine 5. The project leverages advanced AI models, including TTS (text-to-speech) and STT (speech-to-text), to make avatars more responsive and immersive. I integrated these models and used NVIDIA Omniverse to improve real-time rendering, reducing latency in audio lip-sync animations for seamless gameplay. This project was completed during my Spring 2024 internship at Aristocrat.

name: Mobile Loyalty App
short_description: Proof-of-concept loyalty app with NFC and mobile wallet integration
description: This Mobile Loyalty App enables seamless NFC communication with gambling machines, allowing users to earn and manage rewards digitally. I developed this proof-of-concept app using Angular, creating a user-friendly interface for loyalty management. Additionally, I automated mobile wallet pass generation using Python scripts to streamline rewards integration. This project was completed during my Fall 2022/Spring 2023 internship at Aristocrat.
